languages.text: "Я буду стараться, Маражай. Дай мне шанс — останься, и ты не будешь разочарован".
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
languages.original_text: "Я буду стараться, Маражай. Дай мне шанс — останься, и ты не будешь разочарован".

traits.locale_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
"I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

languages.text: «Me esforzaré más, Marazhai. Dame una oportunidad. Quédate y no te decepcionaré».
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

traits.locale_text: «Me esforzaré más, Marazhai. Dame una oportunidad. Quédate y no te decepcionaré».

languages.text: “我会更努力的，玛拉斋。再给我一次机会吧。留在我身边，我不会让你失望。”
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

traits.locale_text: “我会更努力的，玛拉斋。再给我一次机会吧。留在我身边，我不会让你失望。”

languages.text: « Je ferai davantage d'efforts, Marazhai. Laissez-moi une chance. Je vous promets que vous ne serez pas déçu. »
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

traits.locale_text: « Je ferai davantage d'efforts, Marazhai. Laissez-moi une chance. Je vous promets que vous ne serez pas déçu. »

languages.text: 「もう少しやらせてくれ、マラズハイ。私にチャンスをくれ。そうすれば、失望させはしない」
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

traits.locale_text: 「もう少しやらせてくれ、マラズハイ。私にチャンスをくれ。そうすれば、失望させはしない」

languages.text: "Ich gebe mir mehr Mühe, Marazhai. Gebt mir eine Chance. Bleibt, und Ihr werdet nicht enttäuscht werden."
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe mir mehr Mühe, Marazhai. Gebt mir eine Chance. Bleibt, und Ihr werdet nicht enttäuscht werden."

languages.text: "Daha çok çabalayacağım Marazhai. Bana bir şans ver. Benimle kalırsan hayal kırıklığına uğramazsın."
languages.original_text: "I will try harder, Marazhai. Give me a chance. Stay, and you will not be disappointed."
